name: The Slurrs Slaughter
description:
You must fight the Slurrs to escape from their basement. They will arrive from their nests : the flesh pits.

There's only one way to quit this awful place : kill them all and escape the room.

Good luck !

  • Escape from the Slurrs
  • Fight them using covers to survive
  • Discover a brand new level each time you play
